previous.excerpt: Crucial Human Theme is a VSCode IDE dark theme dressed in royal purple and designed to keep you focused. Click "Get It" to install it from the Visual Studio Marketplace or simply search for "Crucial Human" from inside VSCode -> Extensions.
previous.title: Crucial Human Theme for VSCode - A royal dark theme for VSCode

localize.description: Crucial Human Theme是一款VSCode IDE的深色主题，身着皇家紫色的服装，旨在让你专注于此。点击 "Get It "从Visual Studio Marketplace安装它，或者只需在VSCode -> Extensions中搜索 "Crucial Human"。
Crucial Human Theme是一款VSCode IDE的深色主題，身着皇家紫色的服裝，旨在讓你專注於此。點擊 "Get It "從Visual Studio Marketplace安裝它，或者只需在VSCode -> Extensions中搜索 "Crucial Human"。

next.excerpt: A collective list of more than 1000 Free Public and Open REST APIs for developers like movie APIs, Anime APIs, weather APIs, music APIs, games and comics APIs, currency APIs, sports APIs, science APIs, open data APIs, etc.
next.title: Public APIs 3.0 - A collective list of public apis, tools, & knowledge base.

localize.description: 为开发者提供了1000多个免费公开和开放的REST API的集体列表，如电影API、动漫API、天气API、音乐API、游戏和漫画API、货币API、体育API、科学API、开放数据API等。
localize.tagline: 一个公共APIS、工具和知识库的集体列表。

localize.description: 爲開發者提供了1000多個免費公開和開放的REST API的集體列表，如電影API、動漫API、天氣API、音樂API、遊戲和漫畫API、貨幣API、體育API、科學API、開放數據API等。
localize.tagline: 一個公共APIS、工具和知識庫的集體列表。
